name: Igor Likhomanov
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: My name is Igor and I'm a big fan of JS! I am a Head of Back-end Development at Timify. Our tech stack: Node.js, mongoDB, AWS infrastructure.
what_can_i_contribute: I can tell about multi-region (based on AWS) and service-oriented architectures. Also, I can make awesome jokes ;)
